name: Grimmy The Exorcist
description:
Hey you, yes you... don't try to look away! Can you help that town and defeat all the ghosts. Of course, you can. You are Grimmy The Great Exorcist... Now go kid!

So this is my first game. Actually, it's a prototype for a game idea I had for a while. I hope you enjoy it and give me feedback and don't rage if you find bugs, just report them pls :D
